prompt: In the heart of a historic lakeside mansion, a splendid wedding celebration unfolds during the serene embrace of twilight. The central subject is a grand outdoor pavilion, intricately draped with sheer, flowing silk curtains that sway gently in the evening breeze, their translucence catching the subtle hues of the setting sun. A joyous couple is at the center, their love illuminated by an array of delicate fairy lights and softly glowing lanterns, casting intricate patterns on the wooden deck beneath them. This celebration is viewed from a slightly elevated angle, giving prominence to the couple while also capturing the panoramic view of the vast, shimmering lake that serves as a picturesque backdrop. The pavilion is framed centrally, with the expanse of manicured lawns leading into the lush surrounding gardens in the foreground, and the expansive lake stretching into the misty distance. Illuminated by the golden glow of the early evening, the scene is suffused with a romantic, ethereal atmosphere. The gentle waves of the lake reflect the twilight sky's colors, blending seamlessly into the warm tones of the pavilion's lanterns. The color palette is a harmonious mix of warm peach, soft lavender, and deep emerald, evoking a sense of elegance and intimacy. Guests, dressed in elegant attire, mingle gracefully, their laughter a soft murmur against the tranquil lapping of the lake. The style of the image captures the essence of fine art wedding photography, with an emphasis on capturing the fleeting, emotive moments in high resolution and exquisite detail. The image boasts a sharp focus, with particular attention paid to the intricate designs of the pavilion and the delicate expressions of joy and love on the couple's faces, achieving a composition that is both emotionally evocative and technically masterful.

description: The central subject is an outdoor pavilion draped with flowing silk curtains.
A couple stands at the center, celebrating their wedding surrounded by fairy lights.
Guests in elegant attire mingle around the pavilion during the wedding celebration.
questions: Is the central subject an outdoor pavilion?
